Case records of the Massachusetts General Hospital. Case 32-2011. A 19-year-old 
man with recurrent pancreatitis.

Author information:
(1)Department of Pediatric Gastroenterology, Massachusetts General Hospital, and 
Harvard Medical School, Boston, USA.

Comment in
